Description:

The Ball - this adventure first-person shooter, featuring unusual gameplay 
and using the engine from Epic, Unreal Ã¢â€žÂ¢ Engine 3. You're stuck in a cave, 
being brave archaeologist working on the slopes of an extinct volcano somewhere 
in Mexico. Up to you very quickly comes, it's not just a cave. You discover 
ancient ruins, which for centuries have been hidden from outsiders, and find 
a mysterious artifact - Ball, clad in a sink of gold and metal. Moving forward 
and solve the mystery of this amazing place you must unlock the secrets of the 
world and learn to control this ancient artifact. Delving more and more, you 
open some of the greatest mysteries of mankind, and on your way there are not 
just puzzles and traps, but also various strange creatures - the guardians of 
secrets. You must overcome these creatures using only the ball as his only weapon.
